Title: Tear Down This Wall!
Description:
The time has come. Our forces are well-enough entrenched here that we can risk pressing forward, into the Thunder King's lair. Unfortunately, it doesn't look like he'll be opening that gate anytime soon.

I suppose we'll have to make a gate of our own then. Let me know when you're ready, $n.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Lor'themar Theron, then break into the lower city and secure it for the Horde.
RewardText: With your help, we're one giant step closer to our goal.

Objectives.Text: Speak to Lor'themar Theron to begin your mission
